Package com.shopwiki.roger

Interface Summary
RabbitReconnector.ReconnectHandler  
RabbitReconnector.ReconnectLogger  
 

Class Summary
AbstractMessage Extend this class get a free JSON-formatted AbstractMessage.toString() method.
MapMessage Mainly for debugging.
MessagingUtil Static methods for sending JSON-formatted messages (using Jackson) over RabbitMQ.
NonStrictJsonMessage Extend this class to have Jackson ignore extra fields when deserializing JSON messages.
QueueUtil Static methods for declaring the 3 types of queues (used by Roger).
RabbitConnector Wraps a list of RabbitMQ server addresses.
RabbitReconnector Used to re-establish a Connection to a RabbitMQ when a connection breaks.
Route Immutable bean for pairing a RabbitMQ exchange & routing-key.
